mapper.select: select n_foodId foodId, s_foodName foodName,n_typeId typeId,n_eat_part eat_part,n_energy energy,n_moisture moisture, n_protein protein,n_fat fat,n_fiber fiber,n_carbohydrate carbohydrate,n_va va,n_vb1 vb1,n_vb2 vb2,n_niacin niacin, n_ve ve,n_Na na,n_Ca ca,n_Fe fe,n_vc vc,n_cholesterol cholesterol from food_info
